name: thnetii.azuredevops.pipelines.githubtasklibrary.githubaccesstokentask
description: GitHub Access Token task for Azure DevOps Pipelines

scripts.patchInc: npx tsc semverInc.ts && node semverInc.js patch && npm install && pushd .. && npm run patchInc && popd
scripts.minorInc: npx tsc semverInc.ts && node semverInc.js minor && npm install && pushd .. && npm run minorInc && popd
scripts.majorInc: npx tsc semverInc.ts && node semverInc.js major && npm install && pushd .. && npm run majorInc && popd
